column1: Terrazas del Valle – Terraces of the Valley – is a city in Baja California in Tijuana Municipality. The city had a population of 20
column2: 421 as of 2010.Terrezas del Valle is located in the far east of the municipality
column3: southeast of Tijuana and the last major city on the federal highway to Tecate.

column1: This town was founded in 1972 by Salvador Fuentes Ducoing
